<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mission Information </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Autosaves the game (used for Retry). The game can then be loaded from the last autosave with [[loadGame]]. Will not save if the player is [[objNull | null]] or dead.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Since Arma 3 v1.87.145159 a [[BIS_fnc_addScriptedEventHandler | scripted event handler]] [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers/ScriptedEventHandlers#Events | <tt>"OnSaveGame"</tt>]] is available</value></part></template>  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''saveGame''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[saveGame]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[enableSaving]], [[loadGame]], [[savingEnabled]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
